experiences.title: Senior Software Developer
experiences.subtitle: Supermind
workDescription: Enhanced user experience by 25% by developing and integrating dynamic features using React and Node.js.
Integrated a wide range of third-party services and components like **stripe** payment gateway, and geo-location services.
Implemented the application's CI/CD pipeline using AWS **CodePipeline**.
Implemented unit test and automated testing process to ensure high-quality codebase by using **Jest**, and **Mocha**.

experiences.title: Frontend Engineer
experiences.subtitle: Evolphin
workDescription: Improved website performance by optimizing images, reducing page size, and implementing **lazy loading** and **code splitting**.
Reduced system **downtime by 40%** by optimizing server architecture and implementing **Redis** for caching and session management.
Monitored system health, debugged performance issues, and optimized applications using both **server-side** and **client side** techniques.
Implemented the chart with **D3.js**, and **Rechart** for real-time data visualization.

experiences.title: Full Stack Develop
